thread.title: THAI holds aircraft anointing ceremony for Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner and Boeing 777-300ER
thread.title_full: THAI holds aircraft anointing ceremony for Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner and Boeing 777-300ER

author: eTN Global Editor
title: THAI holds aircraft anointing ceremony for Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner and Boeing 777-300ER
text:
THAI holds aircraft anointing ceremony for Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner and Boeing 777-300ER   
Aug 20, 2015 eTN   
BANGKOK, Thailand - Somdej Phra Maha Muneewong, Abbot of Wat Rajabopit Sathitmahasimaram Rajaworavihara, presided over the Aircraft Anointing Ceremony for Thai Airways International Public Company Limited’s two aircraft, Boeing 787-8 royally bestowed the name “KOSUM PHISAI” and Boeing 777-300ER royally bestowed the name “HAT YAI”. 
Present at the ceremony were Mr. Charamporn Jotikasthira (second from left), THAI President, and members of THAI’s Management. The ceremony was held at Hangar Area of THAI’s Technical Department, Suvarnabhumi Airport. 
Both aircraft are equipped with state-of-the-art passenger seats and personal screens with the latest in-flight entertainment system in all classes of travel.
